articles.description: All the Premier League reaction as Brighton beat Liverpool, and Europa League final news conferences for Spurs and Man Utd.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Brighton beat champions Liverpool to keep Europe hopes alive

articles.description: England will introduce minimum fitness standards for their women's players next year, says head coach Charlotte Edwards.
articles.title: England to introduce minimum fitness standards under coach Charlotte Edwards

articles.description: Leicester City are referred to an independent commission by the Premier League for an alleged breach of EFL financial rules while they were in the Championship in the 2023-24 season.
articles.title: Leicester CIty referred over alleged EFL financial breach

articles.description: Manchester United play "the most financially important match in the club's history" against Tottenham on Wednesday - BBC sports editor Dan Roan explains why it is one they cannot afford to lose.
articles.title: Europa League final: The £100m match Manchester United can't afford to lose

articles.description: England men's cricket team do not want to feel out of touch with their fans, says head coach Brendon McCullum.
articles.title: Brendon McCullum asks England to improve 'humility' before Zimbabwe Test

articles.description: "I always win things in my second year," said Ange Postecoglou, who hopes to guide Tottenham to glory in the Europa League final.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: What trophies did he win in second seasons with his clubs?

articles.description: Everton midfielder Abdoulaye Doucoure announces he will leave the club when his deal expires at the end of the season.
articles.title: Abdoulaye Doucoure: Midfielder will leave Everton this summer

articles.description: After the most turbulent period of her career, Iga Swiatek is facing questions about her clay-court game before her French Open title defence.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Can Iga Swiatek still reign as 'Queen of Clay' at Roland Garros?

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your latest questions before the Monaco Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Verstappen, Norris, Piastri, Newey, safety cars and rebuilds after accidents

articles.description: Up to 80,000 Manchester United and Tottenham fans are expected to descend on Bilbao, a city with a population of around 350,000, for Wednesday's Europa League final.
articles.title: Europa League final: How Man Utd & Tottenham fans are taking great lengths to reach Bilbao
